title: Enhancing Software Development Practical Competencies: Designing a University Online Learning Gamification Model: Case Studies

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can propose at least three social studies project designs incorporating gamification elements (experience points/badges/leaderboards).
Learners can derive solutions to improve learner engagement by over 20% by integrating game mechanics into case-based learning scenarios.
Learners can measure and improve the educational effectiveness of gamification models at least twice using formative assessment tools.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
